example.text: Today is #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay. We must #StopTheCartels and close our border. They’re bringing over record amounts of fentanyl and poisoning our country. This sad crisis must end. [[url]]

We must focus on reducing the deficit spending that fuels inflation and eliminating benefit cliffs that create barriers to workforce participation. I had hopes that Committee's work would produce more bipartisan solutions, but I look forward to continuing to tackle these challenges alongside my colleagues where we did find common ground.

I have introduced the Stop the Cartels Act, which creates a new designation for the cartels, known as a Special Transnational Criminal Organization. That designation will allow the US to use the full capacity of our sanctions regime to shut down the support network that enables their operation.

Reminds me of another movie: “Mr. Madison, what you have just said is one of the most insanely idiotic things I have ever heard. At no point in your rambling, incoherent response were you even close to anything that could be considered a rational thought. Everyone in this room is… [[url]] [[url]]
Today is #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay. We must #StopTheCartels and close our border. They’re bringing over record amounts of fentanyl and poisoning our country. This sad crisis must end. [[url]]

I have introduced the Stop the Cartels Act, which creates a new designation for the cartels, known as a Special Transnational Criminal Organization. That designation will allow the US to use the full capacity of our sanctions regime to shut down the support network that enables their operation.
These sanctioning and intelligence tools are the same ones applied to ISIS and Al-Qaeda. This bill is just one piece of the comprehensive border security strategy that our country desperately needs.
